forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers. Mostly cloudy. Low around 42, with temperatures rising to around 53 overnight. West southwest wind 12 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Monday
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Rain Showers then Mostly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers before 8am. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 45. West northwest wind around 15 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Monday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 28. North northwest wind 7 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 44. North northeast wind around 8 mph.

forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible
forecast.detailedForecast: Freezing rain before 3am, then snow likely and freezing rain likely. Cloudy, with a low around 25. North wind 10 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible. Little or no ice accumulation expected.

nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails closed for the day. We will clean up the trails following this weather event.
nubsNob.comments:
Nub's Nob is Closed today due to a widespread power outage. Following the storm we will have some major tree debris to clean-up. 

Please check back to our website in the morning for an update on when we will be able to open.

The last scheduled day of the season is April 6.
